name: blaire
description: The original Dope theme... upgraded and enhanced

force_dark_mode.description: Force dark mode rather than relying on browser detection

show_all_tags.description: Show all tags or only primary tag on posts

show_read_time.description: Show/hide the reading time on a post

tags_below_title.description: Show tags below the title on a post intead of above the title

tag_prefix.description: Text to show before the tags on a post - e.g., Filed under

date_prefix.description: Text to show before the date on a post - e.g., Filed on

disable_lightbox_for_single_images.description: If an image isn't part of a gallery and has no images adjacent to it, should the lightbox not be displayed?

use_pagination.description: Show the pagination on tag and author feeds, or allow the continous "load more" function

proportional_images_on_feeds.description: Enable to allow an image to be displayed with proportional height instead of cropped to 312px height

tags_or_pages.description: Populate the front page from the available tags, or use the featured pages instead

loop.description: Enable the Tiny Slider's looping function? Note: turn this OFF if you have a lot of tags/pages without a featured image to prevent issues.

font_color.description: Color for text displayed on the slider - adjust based on preference or images being used
